Headline: #44 Wallace/Racine Temporary Southbound Reroute near Racine/86th
ShortDescription: Southbound 44 Wallace/Racine buses are temporarily rerouted via Racine, 83rd, Ashland, 87th and Racine due to street blockage near Racine/86th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Southbound #44 Wallace/Racine buses are temporarily rerouted via Racine, 83rd, Ashland, 87th and Racine due to street blockage near Racine/86th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near Wacker/Harbor

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Lake Shore, Monroe, Michigan, Wacker and Columbus: due to, street blockage near Wacker/Harbor.
